name: CirclePong (FlameArchitect)
description:
Pong, but it's a CIRCLE! In this exciting and unique twist on a classic game, keep the ball inside the circle and pass it to yourself to beat your high score. CirclePong will have you hooked for... probably just a few minutes, but I guarantee it'll be a few minutes you will enjoy!

In CirclePong, the ball speeds up over time and challenges your reflexes. You can choose from 10 different color themes. Your high score and color theme save, so you can play again at any time!

CirclePong was made in just 3 days.
